alert.note: Alert for Clark; Pike (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 2:21AM CDT until August 08 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clark County in southwestern Arkansas... East central Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Halfway, or 16 miles northeast of Murfreesboro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Gurdon... Amity... Okolona... Gum Springs in Clark County... Richwoods... Halfway... Antoine... Alpine... Curtis... Shawmut... Hollywood... Griffithtown... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
